thread.title: Arkansas basketball schedules annual Red-White game
thread.title_full: Arkansas basketball schedules annual Red-White game

title: Arkansas basketball schedules annual Red-White game
text:
Arkansas basketball announces plans for annual Red-White game in Fayetteville THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   4:40   4:40   
Subjects: 

FAYETTEVILLE, Arkansas â€” The University of Arkansas has announced plans for the Razorbacks' annual Red-White game. 
The scrimmage will be Sunday, Nov. 1 at Bud Walton Arena with doors opening at 4 p.m. with Razorbacks' players and coach Mike Anderson signing autographs from 4 until 4:30. 
The game is to start at 5 p.m. Rosters will be released next week. 
Admission will be free, but fans are asked to bring a non-perishable food item for donation to the Full; Circle Food Pantry on campus.
